title: Research data quality: non-english, emoji-heavy, url-only
description: Analyze samples of non-english, emoji-heavy, url-only. For each type: extract samples, score relevance, recommend handling strategy.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Paper 1 (non-english): Extract 5+ samples of 'non-english' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 1 (non-english): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 2 (emoji-heavy): Extract 5+ samples of 'emoji-heavy' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 2 (emoji-heavy): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 3 (url-only): Extract 5+ samples of 'url-only' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 3 (url-only): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
